subdisciplines.name: Power Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study and design of systems that generate, transmit, and distribute electrical power.

subdisciplines.name: Control Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study and design of systems that control and regulate other systems or processes through the use of feedback.

subdisciplines.name: Electronics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior and control of electrons and their motion through vacuum, gas, and semiconductor materials.

subdisciplines.name: Telecommunications Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study and design of systems that transmit information over long distances using various forms of media like radio waves, fiber optics, or copper wires.

subdisciplines.name: Computer Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of the design and development of computer systems, including hardware and software aspects.

subdisciplines.name: Signal Processing
subdisciplines.description: The study of operations performed on a signal to extract information and convert it into a form that can be easily analyzed or transmitted.
